|vendor_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |device_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |subvendor_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |subdevice_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |id_string = 3Com 3C509B EtherLink III |windosid = <!-- Windows ID, Leave blank for none --> |fcc_id = DF63C509B |icid = <!-- Industry Canada ID, Leave blank for none --> |boardid = <!-- Board ID --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id --> |ethoui = 00:A0:24

}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== The '''3Com''' logo (big), "EtherLink III", "(C) 1994 3C509B-"<handwritten C>, "ALL RIGHTS RESERVED", "ASSY 03-0021-"<handwritten 001>"REV-"<handwritten A1>, "FCC ID: DF63C509B", amd "10Mbps Signalling Rate" is silkscreened on top of the card. :"FAB: 02-0021-001 REV A" and "[3095] PCBC FR4"... is etched onto the bottom layer of the card. :The Ethernet controller is labeled with... :*'''''Parallel Tasking''''' :*'''3Com''' :*'''40-0130-002''' :*'''9520S 22302553''' :*'''AT&T 40-01302'''
